title: Inochi No Riyu (いのちの理由)
lyrics: Watashi ga umarete kita wake wa Chichi to haha ​​to ni water ta me Watashi ga umarete kita wake wa Kyoudaitachi nor wa ter ta me Watashi ga umarete kita wake wa Tomodachi minna nor water ta me Watashi ga umarete kita wake wa Itoshii anata ni wa ter ta me Haru kureba hana onozukara saku you ni Aki kureba ha wa onozukara chiru you ni Shiawase ni naru tame ni Dare mo ga umarete kita nda yo Kanashimi no hana no ato kara wa Yorokobi no mi ga minoru you ni Watashi ga umarete kita wake wa Dokoka no dareka wo kizutsuke te Watashi ga umarete kita wake wa Dokoka no dareka ni kizutsui te Watashi ga umarete kita wake wa Dokoka no dareka nor sukuware te Watashi ga umarete kita wake wa Dokoka no dareka wo sukuu ta me Yoru ga kite yami onozukara shimiru you Asa ga kite hikari onozukara terasu you Shiawase ni naru tame ni dare mo ga ikite iru nda yo Kanashimi no hana no ato kara wa Yorokobi no mi ga minoru you ni Watashi ga umarete kita wake wa Itoshii anata ni water ta me Watashi ga umarete kita wake wa Itoshii anata wo mamoru ta me
